recommendations: Neely Lawton
Account Manager at Cisco for Sutter Health
February 26, 2013, Shane was senior to Neely but didn’t manage directly

During Neely's time at VQ OrthoCare as a Corporate Accounts Manager, I was highly impressed with her ability to build relationships, manage an extensive book of business, and provide exceptional customer service.  Neely has a very unassuming nature yet an innate drive to succeed.  Having excellent communication, follow-up, and organizational skills, she was intentionally selected to manage many of the company's most important customer relationships.  I would jump at the opportunity to have Neely on my sales, marketing, or corporate accounts team again.

Lynne Coulter
Customer Strategy
April 7, 2012, Lynne worked with Shane in the same group

I first had the opportunity and pleasure of working with Lynne many years ago at OrthoLogic where we were team members negotiating payor contracts and later as sales managers.  My strong opinion of Lynne was formulated at that time given her drive, work ethic, tenacity, leadership capabilities, selling skills, and depth of knowledge.More than a decade later, Lynne was the first person that popped into my mind when searching for an individual to build and manage a national team responsible for payor contracting and healthcare policy at Biomet.  Ironically, LinkedIn connected us after many years, and I was successful in recruiting her to the organization.  Not surprisingly, Lynne immediately jumped in head first taking on the many challenges of her new role.  She successfully built a strong team and quickly gained the trust of the field sales organization.  Since my departure from Biomet, Lynne was promoted and continues to serve as a valuable member of Biomet's senior management team.If given the chance, I would love to work with Lynne again.

Chad Kurtz
VP at Medshape
November 30, 2011, Shane was senior to Chad but didn’t manage directly

I had the good fortune of having Chad on my sales team for several years at OrthoLogic and then DJO.  Chad was a highly dedicated sales representative with outstanding customer relationships and a natural ability to place people at ease.  He consistently achieved quota and growth expectations and was always committed to doing his absolute best.  Chad and I spoke on several occassions about his future, as I felt strongly about his leadership and management capabilities.  Not surprisingly, Chad quickly moved into management, and I have heard through the industry, that he has been highly successful as a sales manager at Smith and Nephew.  I highly recommend Chad and would consider it a privilege to work with him again.

Debbie Koeneman
Medical Device, Combination Product, Pharma & Biotech Regulatory Affairs Consultant
September 22, 2011, Shane was a client of Debbie’s

Debbie and I worked together several years ago at OrthoLogic, where she was considered one of the company's superstar Directors.  Dedicated, hard-working, knowledegable, ethical, results-oriented, positive, and a "can do" attitude were and are some of her strongest attributes.A few years ago, while working at Biomet, an orthopedic medical device manufacturer, I was seeking a resource in the regulatory space with specific PMA expertise.  I engaged Debbie, and again, gained the benefit of her experience and knowledge along with the professional attributes listed above.  Debbie takes a very constructive, objective, and technically accurate approach when offering her advice, opinions, and work product.  Given my responsibility over the commercial side of the business, I look to Debbie for guidance and options, allowing me to make the best possible business decision while protecting the company's and its customer's interests as it relates to the safety, efficacy, and saleability of our products.Debbie is available on short notice, is detail-oriented, organized, and has strong communication and follow-up skills.  Overall, she is an extremely good value for the money, and I highly recommend her.Shane Kelly

summary: Lapels: The Future of Dry Cleaning™ •	Environmentally-friendly dry cleaning featuring GreenEarth®•	Free home pick-up and delivery•	24 Hour drop box•	VIP express service•	Customer loyalty programs•	Alterations & repairs•	Leather, suede, shoe/UGG cleaning•	Gown preservation•	Wash & fold serviceMonday - Friday from 7:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m.Saturday from 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m.Sunday from noon to 3:00 p.m.Conveniently located next to The Melting Pot in The Village at Hayden on the Northwest corner of Via De Ventura and Hayden.
